fr.escape.game.entity.weapons.shot

Class AbstractShot

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.game.entity.weapons.shot.AbstractShot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collisionable, Drawable, Entity, Moveable, Updateable, Shot, Receiver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlackHoleShot, EarthShot, FireBallShot, JupiterShot, MissileShot, MoonShot, ShiboleetShot

    public abstract class AbstractShot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shot
    This class provide a skeletal implementation of any Shot in the game.

      • moveBy

        public void moveBy(float[] velocity)
        Description copied from interface: Moveable

        Apply a velocity to this Entity.

        Velocity is an array with the given properties:

        velocity[0] : Duration of the movement.
        velocity[1] : Force to apply on X.
        velocity[2] : Force to apply on Y.
        velocity[3] (optional) : Use to detect a looping.

        Specified by:
        moveBy in interface Moveable
